emenma ikta aayathanayata ho wena yam pirisakata/pudgalayekuta panna panna pahara dime prathipaththiyak sinhala blogkaruwan athara nathi bawada kiwa yuthuya.thawada sinhala blogkaruwange sansadaye samajikayinge blog satahan ho prakasha ee ee samajikayinge pudgalika adahas wana bawada, eewa sansadaye adahas ho prakasha lesa wataha noganna lesada mathak kara sitimu.emenma duradiga sitha katayuthu karana menda, thama niladharinge nomana kriyakalapaya soyabala wagakimen katayuthu karana lesa awawada karana lesada ikta aayathanaye wagakiwayuthu ihala niladharingen illa sitimu.sthuthiyi.sinhala blogkaruwange sansadaya siduwim kihipayak asannata dakinnata labina.

eheth shri lanka rajya thnthraya magin eya nisiyakarawa kriyathmaka wi nomatha. 1977:94 eksath jathika pakshika rajya thanthraya thrasthawadayata erehiwa yayi kiyamin wata mesa katha sararwa pakshika samulu ha thimpu sakachcha wani jathyanthara samuluda pawathwu namudu eewa pawathwena athara demala thrasthawadin thama yuda shakthiya wadi kara gath bawa peneyi. 1987 di indu lanka giwisumen pasuwa kriyathmaka kala palath sabha kramaya da uthura ha nagenahira nathi prashnayakata (janawararga aragalayata) wisandum washayen kriyathmaka kala namuth eyin da palak nowini.

shri lankawa bihikala wishishtathama pandu yawanna lesa salakena muththayiya muralidarangen pasu shri lankawata test jayagrahana labadime mulikaya bawata rangana herath pathwu athara pasugiya kalaye shri lankawa jayagrahanaya kala test tharagawali bahutharayaka ohu tharagawaliye wiraya sammanaya dina ganima da wisheshathwayaki.

banglor pile jak kalis pandu 55 kadi hathare pahara 8k saha haye pahara 5k samanga nodawi lakunu 89 k ras karamin indiya pi‡∑äramiyar lig oowara wissayi - 20 tharagawaliye panjab pila samanga pawathi tharagayedi kadulu 8ka jayagrahanayak kara thama pila meheyawimata samathwuweya.panjab pila - 203 /3(oowara 20) rawi bopara,77, manwindar bisla 75banglor pila - 204 /2 (oowara 18.5) jak kalis nodawi 89, robin uththappa 51chennayi pilata lakunu 55 ka jayakchennayi pile nayaka mahendra sin doni pandu 33 kata muhuna di hathare pahara 6k saha haye pahara 3k samanga nodawi lakunu 66k ras kirimen saha jastin kemp kalkata pile kadulu 3k lakunu 12kadi dawalimen chennayi pilata lakunu 55 ka jayagrahanayak labadimata samath wuha.chennayi pila - 164/ 3 (oowara 20) mahendra sin doni nodawi 66 , subramaniyam badrinath nodawi 43kalkata pila - 109 (oowara 19.2) riddiman saha 22, murali karthik 21(jastin kemp 12/3, lakshampathi balaj 9/2)ayi.pi.el.tharagamalawe me wanawita peramuna ganimata dilli saha kalkata kandayam samathwa atha.
